title: Supreme Leader Kim Jong-un Riding A White Horse Looks Like A Real-Life 'Prince Charming'
text:
North Korean leader Kim Jong-un climbed the country’s highest mountain peak that too on horseback. Korean Central News Agency (KCNA) shared some pictures showing the leader riding a white horse on snow-covered Mount Paektu.

The location holds a very special place in his heart as it is the birthplace of his father. "His march on horseback in Mt Paektu is a great event of weighty importance in the history of the Korean revolution," said a KCNA report released on Wednesday.

"Sitting on the horseback atop Mt Paektu, [he] recollected with deep emotion the road of arduous struggle he covered for the great cause of building the most powerful country, with faith and will as firm as Mt Paektu," the report added.

As the pictures went viral online, people started a meme fest, comparing him to Russian President Vladmir Putin; others made Game of Thrones, Chronicles of Narnia and Shrek references.

Look at some of the reactions here:

Don't Miss 20.9 K SHARES 14.3 K SHARES 13.8 K SHARES 7.5 K SHARES 5.4 K SHARES

Not the Game of Thrones spinoff series I was hoping for#KimJongUn pic.twitter.com/nhszLvUlom — Amizzle (@amizzle16) October 16, 2019

Is North Korea doing a remake of “The Neverending Story”?

If they are, I imagine Trump will be “The Nothing.”

(really dating myself here)#KimJongUn pic.twitter.com/Nxgf5eAYUt — JΛKΣ (@USMCLiberal) October 16, 2019

10.

Your life maybe shitty but just be thankful that you are not #KimJongUn horse. https://t.co/N8kJSfExMn — Kimmy G (@SniperRani) October 16, 2019

This is not the first time that Kim Jong-un has been spotted at the mountain, his previous visits has always been associated with important decisions. In 2017, when he visited Mount Paektu, a few weeks before his new year's address. He hinted at a diplomatic relation between South Korea.
description: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un climbed the country’s highest mountain peak that too on a horse back. Korean Central News Agency (KCNA) shared some pictures showing the leader riding a white horse on snow-covered Mount Paektu. The location holds a very special place in his heart as it is the birthplace of his father.
